basic_information.scholarship_name: Grant Aguirre Endowed Liberal Arts Outstanding Undergraduate Award

description: In order to apply for this scholarship, you must be nominated by a Liberal Arts faculty member. A former recipient of the Liberal Arts Outstanding Undergraduate award, Dr. Grant Aguirre endowed a fund to acknowledge an outstanding undergraduate student majoring in the College of Liberal Arts. Eligibility Requirements Freshman, sophomore, junior, or senior standing Must be a College of Liberal Arts major Must have a letter of nomination by a UCO College of Liberal Arts Faculty member

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
